name: Family Billiards
description:
How to play

To make a correct move you must hit the lowest ball in the table, if any ball is potted with an incorrect hit it will be placed again on the table and its points will not be counted. The victory is archived when potting the 9 ball.

Other info

This game is based on the original 9 ball game of Family Billiards for the MSX. The project has been developed for a school subject and it's not finished yet! Some new features might be added in the future such as:

  • Sound effects
  • AI
  • Vs game
  • New game modes
  • New sprites

Be aware that bugs might appear and feel free to leave a comment!
